archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0256
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to make my home phone number private, so that I can protect my privacy

properties.value: This one is about making a number private (protected, CLI). Note: to be discussed with the OSS team. To be checked in aspect of UI journey (whether this option should be available for all customers, etc)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
